description: Try our easy to follow Ravioli with Tomato & Zucchini Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Zucchini,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Mince,Tomato,Chicken,Sesame free,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Ravioli with Tomato & Zucchini Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 4 minutes or until soft. Add zucchini, tomato and 1/2 cup of water. Stir to combine. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 3 minutes. Remove from heat.
Place spinach into a bowl and add enough boiling water to cover. Stand for 1 minute or until wilted. Drain and cool. Squeeze well to remove excess water. Finely chop and transfer to a bowl.
Add mince, lemon rind and ricotta. Season. Roughly chop half the basil. Add to mince mixture and stir well to combine. Mix cornflour and 6 teaspoons of water to form a smooth paste.
Cut lasagne sheets into 4 pieces. Lay half on a board. Place 1 teaspoon mince mixture into centre of each. Brush edges of pasta with cornflour paste. Top with remaining pieces and press to seal.
Bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Add ravioli, in batches, and cook for 3 minutes or until they float.
Remove ravioli with a slotted spoon and divide between plates. Spoon sauce over and top with remaining basil. Serve with salad.
